00018 class SimPbEntry
00019 {
00020     public:
00021         SimPbEntry();
00022         SimPbEntry(const SimPbEntry & entry);
00023 
00024         ~SimPbEntry(); // destructor not virtual !!!
00025 
00026         INT                 GetRecNo() const { return m_recno; }
00027         const WString &     GetName() const { return m_name; }
00028         const PhoneNumber & GetPhoneNumber() const { return m_phonenumber; }
00029         UINT8               GetCphsStatus() const { return m_cphsstatus; }
00030         UINT8               GetCmiRecordNo() const { return m_cmi_no; }
00031 
00032         BOOLEAN             HasData() const;
00033         INT                 GetCphsIndexLevelIndicator() const { return (INT)(m_cphsstatus & 0x0F); }
00034         BOOLEAN             HasCphsPremiumServiceIndicator() const { return (INT)(m_cphsstatus & 0x10) > 0; }
00035         BOOLEAN             HasCphsNetworkSpecificIndicator() const { return (INT)(m_cphsstatus & 0x20) > 0; }
00036 
00037         void SetData(INT recno, const PhoneNumber & phno, const WString & name, UINT8 cphsstatus, UINT8 cmi_no);
00038         void ClearData();
00039         void ResetData();
00040 
00041         SimPbEntry & operator = (const SimPbEntry & szCopy);
00042 
00043     private:
00044         INT         m_recno;
00045         WString     m_name;
00046         PhoneNumber m_phonenumber;
00047         UINT8       m_cphsstatus;   // only used for CPHS_INFNUM entries
00048         UINT8       m_cmi_no;       // only used for BDN entries        
00049 };

00051 const SimPbEntry * const c_unread_entry = (SimPbEntry *)-1;
